strIntroduction: Be on the lookout for whales during this 3-hour cruise on Faxafloi Bay in Reykjavik. Cruise along Iceland's west coast to encounter humpback, minke whales, and white-beaked dolphins. Afterward, learn more about whales at the Whale Exhibition Center.
strTitle: Whale-Watching Tour from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Enjoy awe-inspiring aerial views of Reykjavik and its mountains on this 40-minute shared Iceland helicopter tour.
strTitle: Reykjavik Helicopter Tour: Mt Esja Summit

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。
strTitle: Europe Pocket WiFi

strIntroduction: Take a trip to the edge of Iceland on a full-day tour from Reykjavik. Travel to Látrabjarg, the westernmost part of Iceland and all of Europe, passing through stunning scenery. At Látrabjarg you will explore the area that is home to many species of birds.
strTitle: Látrabjarg - Edge of Iceland

strIntroduction: Admire nature’s own spectacular light show on a 2-hour cruise from Reykjavik Harbour, sailing out towards the unknown in search of the Northern Lights. See their brilliant colors flashing across the evening sky, with views of Reykjavík in the background.
strTitle: Northern Lights Viewing Cruise from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Available throughout the year, this speleology tour takes you to unique locations in Iceland’s most spectacular lava tube caves and craters. These beautiful, natural phenomena were created when the surface lava solidified but magma continued to flow in tunnels.
strTitle: Volcanic Veins - Caving in Lava Tube Tour from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Get ready for an Icelandic off-road adventure with this quad bike tour of the twin peaks of Hafrafell and Úlfarsfell mountains. Venture off the beaten path in an ATV to get an up-close perspective of natural attractions like Lake Hafravatn during the 3.5-hour tour. Admire stunning vistas of Reykjavik, the Blue Mountain range and Hellisheiði Power Station from the summits, and feel the thrill of cruising across the rugged wintry wonderland and up and down steep mountain tracks.
strTitle: Twin Peak Quad Bike Adventure from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Find the ultimate relaxation when in Reykjavik on this excursion to the Blue Lagoon. Surrounded by lava fields and snow-capped mountains, the Blue Lagoon is a geothermal spa outside the city where you can bathe in the warm waters, have a water massage or enjoy a spa treatment. With your transportation all arranged, just lie back and relax, before catching your transport back to your hotel in Reykjavik or to Keflavik Airport for your flight home.
strTitle: Blue Lagoon Spa Roundtrip Transport from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Hike and climb Iceland's Sólheimajökull, one of the most beautiful glaciers in the world. Along with an expert guide, you can explore the deep crevasses and even climb its glassy ice walls with provided safety equipment.
strTitle: Day Trip from Reykjavik: Glacier Hiking and Ice Climbing on Iceland's Sólheimajokull Glacier

strIntroduction: This tour takes you to unique sights of Iceland's most spectacular lava tube caves and craters.
strTitle: Iceland from Below

strIntroduction: Take a scenic route of Iceland's South Coast to experience the amazing geological beauty of the country on a full-day tour. See famous volcanoes, waterfalls, glaciers and black sand beaches. Travel in a small group for more personalized service.
strTitle: Iceland's South Coast & Volcanoes Day Tour

strIntroduction: We start with the black as we explore the hidden world of the lava field under the Þingvellir national park. Walking in a cave and discovering the marvels that volcanic activity has created in the past is a trip that everyone can undertake.
strTitle: Þingvellir National Park- snorkeling

strIntroduction: This tour is for those that don t have too much time but still want to make the most their stay. The tour takes you to the Blue Lagoon before exploring the Golden Circle: Þingvellir national park, Geysir and Gullfoss waterfall.
strTitle: The Blue Lagoon and Gullfoss with Geysir

strIntroduction: Experience Iceland's unique volcanic landscapes on this bus tour from Reykjavik. You'll explore the Landmannalauger geothermal area and volcanic mountains, bathe in a geothermal pool, and visit Hekla, one of Iceland's famous volcanoes.
strTitle: Landmannalaugar by bus

strIntroduction: Experience a handful of Iceland’s most popular attractions in a single day with this Super Saver from Reykjavik. Soak in the milky, mineral-rich waters of the Blue Lagoon and treat your skin to a silica mud mask in the midst of a steamy landscape. Once you’re fully relaxed, tour Iceland’s rugged geothermal fields to see the natural hot springs and spouting geysers of Geysir and Strokkur. Marvel at the thundering Gullfoss waterfall and take a scenic drive through the UNESCO-listed Thingvellir National Park.
strTitle: The Blue Langoon and Gullfoss with Geysir - with standard entrance

strIntroduction: Prepare yourself for the adventure of a lifetime on our tour of Iceland’s spectacular south coast, which includes an exhilarating hike through Porsmork (otherwise known as Thor’s Woodland). This inspiring tour will introduce you to an area of unparalleled beauty as you come face to face with Iceland’s distinctive natural wonders.
strTitle: South coast and Thórsmörk

strIntroduction: If you are a certified diver, with or without a dry suit experience, this tour is something for you. It gives you the opportunity to dive in one of the world’s top ten diving sites Silfra, situated in the Þingvellir National Park.
strTitle: Silfra Fissure diving

strIntroduction: Explore the geothermal areas and glacial landscapes of Iceland on a 6-hour bus tour of Gullfoss, Geysir, and Thingvellir National Park. Go to the site of the open-air assembly that ran from 930 to 1798, and see evidence of how the land was cultivated.
strTitle: Gulfoss and Geysir Express Half-Day Trip from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Thrill at the sight of one of the most awe-inspiring phenomena of the oceans: majestic whales swimming and diving in their natural habitat.
strTitle: Whale watching tour - with transfer

strIntroduction: The Reykjanes Peninsula tour offers extreme variety of landscapes dotted with fissures, lava fields and geothermal activity.
strTitle: Reykjanes Peninsula & Krýsuvík geothermal area

strIntroduction: Journey through Iceland's underground caves and craters on this unique day trip about an hour outside of Reykjavik.
strTitle: Iceland from Below Tour

strIntroduction: This Golden Circle Super Jeep tour allows visitors to get in touch with some of Iceland’s most famous and exciting natural phenomena.
strTitle: Golden Circle Jeep Tour

strIntroduction: On this 60-minute tour of the Icelandic brewery Ölgerðin, you will learn about the quirkiness of Icelandic drinking culture while indulging in several drinks yourself. Discover the history of Iceland's brewing tradition through stories across the ages.
strTitle: Olgerdin Brewery Tour from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Enjoy Skaftafell National Park at your own leisure.This one way transfer from Reykjavík takes you to Skaftafell National Park. We leave Reykjavík at 7:30am and arrive in the National Park in Skaftafell at around noon.
strTitle: Reykjavík Skaftafell Express

strIntroduction: This tour is ideal as a relaxing end to a busy day or as a beginning of a fun night in town.
strTitle: Whale watching in the Midnight Sun - with transfer

strIntroduction: This combination of a Viking Horse Riding Tour and AH11 Golden Circle Afternoon is for those who don't have much time, but want to make the most of their day.
strTitle: The Viking Horse Riding tour and Gullfoss with Geysir in the afternoon

strIntroduction: Whale Safari is Reykavik’s only small group’s whale watching tour operator. Our specially made RIB boats are made to get close to the whales, dolphins and puffins of the Faxaflói Bay.
strTitle: Whale and Puffin Watching by Rib Boats
Malta Sightseeing Tour: Blue Grotto, Marsaxlokk and Ghar Dalam
Gozo Day Trip from Malta Including Ggantija Temples

strIntroduction: Enjoy a full-day excursion to Gozo from Malta. Discover the island's splendid highlights, such as the Azure Window, the Citadel of Rabat, the ancient Ggantija Temples, and even a bit of legend: Odysseus is said to have been stranded there for 7 years.
strTitle: Full-Day Gozo Island Excursion from Malta
Valletta Walking Tour Including Grandmaster’s Palace

strIntroduction: Take a full-day tour of central Malta and discover its history and culture. Visit the Mosta Church, stroll through San Antons Gardens, watch artisans and glass blowers at work in Ta' Qali. See St. Paul's Grotto, tour Mdina, enjoy lunch, and much more.
strTitle: Central Malta Full-Day Tour with Lunch
French Riviera Scenic Helicopter Tour from Monaco
Small-Group Monaco Night Tour
Small-Group Tour: French Riviera in One Day from Monaco

strIntroduction: Explore the glamour of the French Riviera on a half-day tour of Monaco and its surrounding villages. With convenient departures from Cannes, Nice, and Monaco, you will also head for the hillside village of Eze and drive along the “Terrace of Monaco.”
strTitle: Monaco, Monte Carlo and Eze Half-Day Trip

strIntroduction: Create a unique souvenir of your time in Monaco on a private 1 or 2-hour photo shoot at the French Riviera location(s) of your choice. Take home personalized photos of you in front of the city’s most stunning backdrops, and choose from a range of options.
strTitle: Monaco: Private Professional and Luxury Photo Shoot

strIntroduction: Explore the French Riviera and see beautiful beaches and celebrity homes on this luxurious 3-hour boat cruise. Glide by Cap Martin and its beaches, Beaulieu, Bay of Eze, St. Jean Cap Ferrat and the beautiful Fossette Creek.
strTitle: Private Riviera 3-Hour Boat Cruise

strIntroduction: On the French Riviera, the driving force of your life spent on the steering wheel of a Ferrari F430 F1 Spider. Izmir scenic cruising along the lane, and Monte Carlo overlooking a stunning panorama road.
strTitle: Monaco 30 / 60 - Minute Ferrari Driving Experience

strIntroduction: Enjoy visiting the most glamorous country in the world, Monaco, and Monte Carlo's royal palace. Admire panoramic views over Nice as you drive by the Middle Corniche road. Stop at Eze, a perched medieval village with artisan shops and breathtaking views.
strTitle: From Villefranche: Private Half-Day Monaco Shore Excursion

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。
strTitle: Europe Pocket WiFi

strIntroduction: Relax on this three-hour evening boat cruise around Oslo’s harbor and the northern end of the Oslofjord.
strTitle: Norwegian evening on the fjord

strIntroduction: Enjoy a dog sledding trip into white landscapes, through beautiful wilderness. After your trip you can relax with a hot meal served in the traditional Sami herdsmen’s tent- lavvu!
strTitle: Dog Sledding in Lyngsfjord, Tromsø

strIntroduction: Save time and money during your Oslo visit with Oslo Pass. With a choice between a 24, 48 or 72 hour card, Oslo Pass offers free admission to a selection of over 30 attractions, museums, and tours for one low pre-paid price.
strTitle: 24/48/72 Hour Oslo Pass Discount Card

strIntroduction: Try an exciting dog sledding trip into a beautiful winter landscape!
strTitle: Dog sledding in Geilo - 5km

strIntroduction: On the Hardangerfjord in a nutshell round trip, you will experience a journey through a landscape of majestic mountains, roaring waterfalls and idyllic orchards.
strTitle: Hardangerfjord in a Nutshell

strIntroduction: Enjoy a dose of snow-filled fun on this 2.5-hour winter activity camp experience from Tromsø. With a local guide, travel outside the city to enjoy a variety of exciting winter pursuits. Ride toboggans down icy hillsides, plod through the woodland on snowshoes and try cross-country skiing or ice-skating. Relax by the campfire with a hot drink and cake as your guide shares stories about the surrounding Arctic landscape. No winter sports experience is necessary and activities are suitable for all the family.
strTitle: Tromso Winter Adventure: Snowshoeing, Tobogganing and Cross-Country Skiing

strIntroduction: Be Superman for a day and learn to fly in Scandinavia's first wind tunnel in Voss!
strTitle: Indoor Skydiving in Voss

strIntroduction: This Segway tour will show you the beautiful city of Bergen and you will get a once in a lifetime segway experience in the mountains.
strTitle: Segway Experience in Bergen

strIntroduction: Climb aboard a wooden sailing ship for a 3-hour cruise of the Oslo fjords. Pass a maze of green islands, and sit back to enjoy the cinematic scenery. Savor the fresh flavor of fjord shrimps at a dinner buffet, with hot and cold drinks from the bar.
strTitle: Oslo Fjords 3-Hour Evening Buffet Cruise

strIntroduction: Day trip rafting with lunch on the river Sjoa, the most famous river for rafting in Northern Europe. Sjoa offers quality rafting for both beginners and the experienced.
strTitle: Rafting Day Trip on the Sjoa River

strIntroduction: Looking for an alternative outdoor activity to skiing and hiking this winter? During a snowshoe hike you will be rewarded with stunning snowy landscapes and a winter fjord view.
strTitle: Snowshoe Hiking Tour

strIntroduction: Experience the magnificent Lysefjord, the Pulpit Rock (Preikestolen), wild and beautiful coastal scenery, the popular Norway in a nutshell trip.
strTitle: Pulpit Rock & Norway in a Nutshell

strIntroduction: Spend an evening aboard a wooden sailboat in Oslo, and sail around the waters of Oslo Fjord. A great way to see the waterfront sights as the sun goes down, this 3-hour boat cruise follows a route past Akershus Fortress, Oslo Opera House and more. Cruise around the pretty islets of the fjord, and enjoy a snack of shrimps as you go.
strTitle: Norwegian Evening Cruise on the Fjord

strIntroduction: On this walking tour of Oslo you’ll be introduced to the unique flavors of the deep valleys and the remote fishing villages as you taste regional specialties. Visit out-of-the-way places, see historical sites, and taste locally made beers as well.
strTitle: Oslo Food and Beer: 4-Hour Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Cycle the flat city center streets of Oslo exploring all the major highlights. Bike in a leisurely fashion past the castle of Akershus Festning, City Hall, Royal Palace, Oslo Fjord, and much more.
strTitle: Oslo Highlights 3-Hour Bike Tour

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。
strTitle: Europe Pocket WiFi

strIntroduction: Enjoy a four hour bike tour through an immense wilderness called the marka, full of wild berries, dozens of lakes, moose, and stunning views of Oslo and the fjord below.
strTitle: Oslo: Forest to Fjord Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Visit Frogner Park (commonly known as Vigeland Park), the Holmenkollen Ski Jump and three top Oslo museums on a half-day city tour of Oslo! Travel between each must-visit attraction by coach, and learn all about each site from an expert guide.
strTitle: All-Inclusive Oslo City Tour: Viking Ship Museum, Vigeland Park, Polarship Fram Museum and Kon-Tiki Museum

strIntroduction: The Sognefjord, Norway’s longest and deepest fjord, extends more than 200 km inland to the foot of the Jotunheimen mountains. This area is said to be one of the most beautiful travel destinations in the world.
strTitle: Sognefjord in a Nutshell

strIntroduction: Use this Sim Card among 11 European countries with high-speed networks and unlimited data!
strTitle: Europe Prepaid Sim Card
Moscow Shooting Experience: Shoot an AK-47 at the Central Shooting Club
Kremlin Small-Group Tour

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。
strTitle: Europe Pocket WiFi
Tour of Pushkin (Tsarskoye Selo) and Catherine Palace
Half Day Tour of Peterhof (Petrodvorets)
Moscow Metro Tour
Private Tour: Russian Cooking Class in St Petersburg
Russian Vodka Museum Tour in St Petersburg
Folklore Show 'Feel Yourself Russian' with Russian Buffet Dinner

strIntroduction: Tour the world-renowned Hermitage Museum in St. Petersburg with a 3-hour guided visit. Walk the reception halls of the Winter Palace, and tour the art gallery to behold the great masterpieces of Western European art. Then explore the rest at leisure.
strTitle: St. Petersburg: Skip-the-Line Hermitage Museum Tour

strIntroduction: The Kremlin is Russia's main museum and the residence of the President. Take this exciting opportunity to get inside the 15th-century fortress and tour its vast territory and world-class museums.
strTitle: Kremlin and Armory with transfer

strIntroduction: Enjoy a guided walk in Stockholm’s Old Town area, known as Gamla Stan. Your guide will take you through Stortorget, the city’s main square, tell you about Stockholm’s history, and show you some of the oldest spots in the city that visitors rarely see.
strTitle: Old Town Walkabout - Guided Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Take the cable car up to the mountain Nuolja. Marvel at the fantastic views in the arctic circle and the amazing sun at midnight！
strTitle: ABISKO - MIDNIGHT WALK

strIntroduction: Tour the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Birka, departing by boat from Stockholm. Dating back to the 8th century, Birka was perhaps Sweden's earliest city, and this excursion will reveal the settlement's historical Viking treasures.
strTitle: Birka: Viking City – Boat Trip from Stockholm City Hall

strIntroduction: Christmas is one of Sweden's most beloved holidays and the preparations begin weeks in advance. Follow your guide on a stroll through the Old Town to learn all about how the Swedes celebrate Christmas today, and how they did so in ancient times.
strTitle: Christmas Spirit in Stockholm - Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Skip the long lines for taxis, or the hassle of navigating public transport upon arrival at Stockholm International Airport, and enjoy a private, chauffeur driven transfer to your city hotel in a stylish, comfortable, and luxurious vehicle.
strTitle: Private Airport Transfer to/from Stockholm

strIntroduction: Enjoy a tasty 4-hour brunch on board an elegant sea restaurant and sail past Gothenburg and the island of Hisingen, the 4th largest and most populous island in Sweden. Taste typical Swedish produce, such as marinated salmon, local sausages, and more.
strTitle: Brunch Cruise Gothenburg

strIntroduction: Sightseeing by Stockholm’s oldest sightseeing boats is a fun, beautiful and comfortable way to experience the city. You can hop on and hop off at the various stops as often as you like, or stay onboard and enjoy the ride. The ticket is valid for 24 h.
strTitle: 24hr boat Hop on - Hop off

strIntroduction: Enjoy a tasty 4-hour dinner on board an elegant cruise boat, and sail past Gothenburg and the island of Hisingen; the 4th largest and most populous island in Sweden. Taste gourmet Swedish produce, such as fennel and baked salmon from the à la carte menu.
strTitle: Hisingen Island Dinner Cruise From Gothenburg

strIntroduction: Enjoy a Swedish summer buffet dinner on a evening dinner cruise of Lake Mälaren, the third largest lake in Sweden. Savor Swedish specialties and crossover favorites, while an on board DJ keeps you dancing and the views keep you smiling.
strTitle: Dinner Buffet Lake Mälaren – Summer Cruise with Music

strIntroduction: All of Stockholm in your hand for 24 H – save time and money with Stockholm Pass. Discover the city with numerous benefits and discounts.
strTitle: Stockholm Pass 1 day (24 H)

strIntroduction: Take a trip into rural Sweden as the sun sets and see moose, wild boar, and roe deer just 20 minutes from Stockholm city center. You’ll enjoy a short hike in the forest as well as a hot drink and snacks on this unique 4-hour excursion.
strTitle: Wildlife Safari in Stockholm

strIntroduction: This is a combined bus sightseeing and guided walking tour which shows you the whole of Stockholm's inner city.
strTitle: Stockholm Panorama and Old Town Walk

strIntroduction: Explore Stockholm by bus and boat on this 3.5-hour tour that covers all of the city's highlights. Aboard a comfortable coach, tour the city's highlights like Stadshuset (City Hall), the island of Djurgården, the Vasa Museum and Kungliga Slottet (the Royal Palace). Then hop on to a canal boat to cruise around the city's scenic archipelago and end with a fantastic photo op of the coastal city's skyline.
strTitle: Stockholm in a Bus and Boat

strIntroduction: Get a unique souvenir of your time in Stockholm with a private 30-minute to 2-hour photo shoot in front of famous monuments or picturesque neighborhoods. Your personal photographer will create personalized full size images to share and print.
strTitle: Private Professional Photo Shoot in Stockholm

strIntroduction: Use this Sim Card among 11 European countries with high-speed networks and unlimited data!
strTitle: Europe Prepaid Sim Card

strIntroduction: Embark on a full day fishing tour. Your guide is a fisherman from the archipelago islands, and from Vaxholm you will travel in his little fishing boat.
strTitle: Full Day Fishing in the Archipelago of Stockholm

strIntroduction: Explore Stockholm’s closest archipelago on a return or 1-way cruise to the island of Fjäderholmarna. Take a walk through the town’s colorful streets and artisan shops, stay as long as you like, and enjoy some of the island's charming restaurants.
strTitle: Fjäderholmarna Return or 1-Way Cruise from Stockholm

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。
strTitle: Europe Pocket WiFi

strIntroduction: See the highlights of Stockholm’s Old Town as day turns to night on a 2-hour sunset bike tour along traffic-free bike paths. Discover hidden gems in the Östermalm neighborhood, marvel at the natural wonders of Djurgården Island, and more.
strTitle: Stockholm: 2-Hour Summer Sunset Bike Tour

strIntroduction: One of the best ways to explore Stockholm’s many islands is by bike. An expert guide will show you the city’s major attractions and some of its hidden gems as well. The Royal National City Park is also included on this tour.
strTitle: Stockholm Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Climb aboard a classic ship and cruise Stockholm’s archipelago on a 3-hour lunch or dinner cruise. Experience the unspoiled nature of the city’s waterways, and enjoy a delicious lunch or dinner of classic chef-prepared Swedish and international cuisine.
strTitle: Archipelago Cruise at Lunch or Dinnertime to Vaxholm

strIntroduction: Enjoy an exciting photography tour of the picturesque city of Stockholm. Tour the Swedish capital's most famous sights, including the Royal Palace, City Hall, and the beautiful King's Garden park, and discover the best shooting angles from your guides.
strTitle: Best of Stockholm: Guided Photography Tour

strIntroduction: Explore the shoreline and the heights of Stockholm on a Segway! On this 2-hour tour you'll see the city's magnificent waterfront, the lovely green setting of the old prison island of Långholmen, and the arty districts in Stockholm's downtown area.
strTitle: Stockholm Heights and Shoreline: 2-Hour Segway Tour

strIntroduction: Get a taste of Sweden through its cuisine on this 3-hour walk through Gamla Stan, the historic heart of Stockholm. Combine sightseeing and Swedish food in one tour and enjoy both!
strTitle: Stockholm Old Town Culinary Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Embark on a day-long kayak trip to explore the Stockholm Archipelago. You’ll paddle at an easy tempo with your guide among thousands of uninhabited islands, discover the area’s wildlife, and enjoy a tasty lunch in the wilderness.
strTitle: Kayaking Day in the Archipelago

strIntroduction: Discover why Stockholm is famed for its historic charm and natural beauty on a 2-hour city tour of its must-see sights. Explore the Old Town, enjoy skip-the-line entry to the Vasa Museum, and take the ferry over to beautiful island of Djurgården.
strTitle: Stockholm City Tour: Djurgården Island & Vasa Museum

strIntroduction: Explore the home of Stockholm’s hipsters, vintage shops, and latte moms on a 1.5-hour walking tour of Södermalm Island. Discover fabulous restaurants and cafés. Learn about the witch trials and executions in the once working class area of the city.
strTitle: Bohemian Stockholm: Walking Tour of Södermalm Island

strIntroduction: Go on an 8-hour journey from Stockholm to the outer archipelago, cruising the shallow Strömma Canal on board the only boat capable of navigating the narrow passages. Disembark to explore the island’s bohemian streets, and enjoy classic Swedish food.
strTitle: Canal Tour to Sandhamn from Stockholm
